verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> shall the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> be likened unto <S%G3666><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> virgins, <S%G3933><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> their <S%G848><s%> lamps, <S%G2985><s%> and went forth <S%G1831><s%> to meet <S%G1519><s%> <S%G529><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> bridegroom. <S%G3566><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> wise, <S%G5429><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> were foolish. <S%G3474><s%>

They that <S%G3748><s%> were foolish <S%G3474><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> lamps, <S%G2985><s%> and took <S%G2983><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> oil <S%G1637><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them: <S%G1438><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wise <S%G5429><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> oil <S%G1637><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G848><s%> vessels <S%G30><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> their <S%G848><s%> lamps. <S%G2985><s%>
While <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> tarried, <S%G5549><s%> they all <S%G3956><s%> slumbered <S%G3573><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> slept. <S%G2518><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> at midnight <S%G3319><s%> <S%G3571><s%> there was a cry <S%G2906><s%> made, <S%G1096><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> cometh; <S%G2064><s%> go ye out <S%G1831><s%> to meet <S%G1519><s%> <S%G529><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
Then <S%G5119><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> virgins <S%G3933><s%> arose, <S%G1453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> trimmed <S%G2885><s%> their <S%G848><s%> lamps. <S%G2985><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> foolish <S%G3474><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> wise, <S%G5429><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> oil; <S%G1637><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> lamps <S%G2985><s%> are gone out. <S%G4570><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wise <S%G5429><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Not so; lest <S%G3379><s%> there be not enough <S%G714><s%> <S%G3756><s%> for us <S%G2254><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you: <S%G5213><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> go <S%G4198><s%> ye rather <S%G3123><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> them that sell, <S%G4453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> buy <S%G59><s%> for yourselves. <S%G1438><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> while they <S%G846><s%> went <S%G565><s%> to buy, <S%G59><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> came; <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they that were ready <S%G2092><s%> went in <S%G1525><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> marriage: <S%G1062><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> door <S%G2374><s%> was shut. <S%G2808><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Afterward <S%G5305><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> other <S%G3062><s%> virgins, <S%G3933><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> open <S%G455><s%> to us. <S%G2254><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> not. <S%G3756><s%>

Watch <S%G1127><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> ye know <S%G1492><s%> neither <S%G3756><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> cometh. <S%G2064><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the kingdom of heaven is as <S%G5618><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> traveling into a far country, <S%G589><s%> who called <S%G2564><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> servants, <S%G1401><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> his <S%G848><s%> goods. <S%G5224><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> unto one <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> he gave <S%G1325><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> talents, <S%G5007><s%> to <S%G1161><s%> another <S%G3739><s%> two, <S%G1417><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> to another <S%G3739><s%> one; <S%G1520><s%> to every man <S%G1538><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his several <S%G2398><s%> ability; <S%G1411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> took his journey. <S%G589><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> he that had received <S%G2983><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> talents <S%G5007><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> traded <S%G2038><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the same, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> them other <S%G243><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> talents. <S%G5007><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> likewise <S%G5615><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> that had received two, <S%G1417><s%> he <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> gained <S%G2770><s%> other <S%G243><s%> two. <S%G1417><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> he that had received <S%G2983><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> went <S%G565><s%> and digged <S%G3736><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth, <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hid <S%G613><s%> his <S%G848><s%> lord's <S%G2962><s%> money. <S%G694><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> a long <S%G4183><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%> of those <S%G1565><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> cometh, <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> reckoneth <S%G4868><s%> <S%G3056><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> so he that had received <S%G2983><s%> five <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4002><s%> talents <S%G5007><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and brought <S%G4374><s%> other <S%G243><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> talents, <S%G5007><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> thou deliveredst <S%G3860><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> talents: <S%G5007><s%> behold, <S%G2396><s%> I have gained <S%G2770><s%> beside <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> talents <S%G5007><s%> more. <S%G243><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> His <S%G846><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Well done, <S%G2095><s%> thou good <S%G18><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> servant: <S%G1401><s%> thou hast been <S%G2258><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> a few things, <S%G3641><s%> I will make thee ruler <S%G2525><s%> <S%G4571><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> many things: <S%G4183><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> thou into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> lord. <S%G2962><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> He also that had received <S%G2983><s%> <S%G2532><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> talents <S%G5007><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> thou deliveredst <S%G3860><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> talents: <S%G5007><s%> behold, <S%G2396><s%> I have gained <S%G2770><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> other <S%G243><s%> talents <S%G5007><s%> beside <S%G1909><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

His <S%G846><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Well done, <S%G2095><s%> good <S%G18><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> servant; <S%G1401><s%> thou hast been <S%G2258><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> a few things, <S%G3641><s%> I will make thee ruler <S%G2525><s%> <S%G4571><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> many things: <S%G4183><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> thou into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> he which had received <S%G2983><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> talent <S%G5007><s%> came <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4334><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> I knew <S%G1097><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou art <S%G1488><s%> a hard <S%G4642><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> reaping <S%G2325><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> thou hast not <S%G3756><s%> sown, <S%G4687><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gathering <S%G4863><s%> where <S%G3606><s%> thou hast not <S%G3756><s%> strewed: <S%G1287><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I was afraid, <S%G5399><s%> and went <S%G565><s%> and hid <S%G2928><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> talent <S%G5007><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth: <S%G1093><s%> lo, <S%G2396><s%> there thou hast <S%G2192><s%> that is thine. <S%G4674><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> His <S%G846><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Thou wicked <S%G4190><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> slothful <S%G3636><s%> servant, <S%G1401><s%> thou knewest <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I reap <S%G2325><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> I sowed <S%G4687><s%> not, <S%G3756><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gather <S%G4863><s%> where <S%G3606><s%> I have not <S%G3756><s%> strewed: <S%G1287><s%>

Thou <S%G4571><s%> oughtest <S%G1163><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to have put <S%G906><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> money <S%G694><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> exchangers, <S%G5133><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> then at my coming <S%G2064><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> should have received <S%G2865><s%> <S%G302><s%> mine own <S%G1699><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> usury. <S%G5110><s%>

Take <S%G142><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> talent <S%G5007><s%> from <S%G575><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> it unto him which hath <S%G2192><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> talents. <S%G5007><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> unto everyone <S%G3956><s%> that hath <S%G2192><s%> shall be given, <S%G1325><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he shall have abundance: <S%G4052><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> from <S%G575><s%> him <S%G3588><s%> that hath <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> shall be taken away <S%G142><s%> even <S%G575><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G532><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> he hath. <S%G2192><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> cast <S%G1544><s%> ye the <S%G3588><s%> unprofitable <S%G888><s%> servant <S%G1401><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> outer <S%G1857><s%> darkness: <S%G4655><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> weeping <S%G2805><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth. <S%G3599><s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> shall come <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G848><s%> glory, <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> shall he sit <S%G2523><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> glory: <S%G1391><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> him <S%G846><s%> shall be gathered <S%G4863><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations: <S%G1484><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he shall separate <S%G873><s%> them <S%G846><s%> one from another, <S%G240><s%> <S%G575><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> a shepherd <S%G4166><s%> divideth <S%G873><s%> his sheep <S%G4263><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> goats: <S%G2056><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he shall set <S%G2476><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G848><s%> right hand, <S%G1188><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> goats <S%G2055><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> the left. <S%G2176><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> shall the <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> say <S%G2046><s%> unto them <S%G3588><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G848><s%> right hand, <S%G1188><s%> Come, <S%G1205><s%> ye blessed <S%G2127><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> inherit <S%G2816><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> prepared <S%G2090><s%> for you <S%G5213><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world: <S%G2889><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I was hungry, <S%G3983><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye gave <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> meat: <S%G5315><s%> I was thirsty, <S%G1372><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye gave me drink: <S%G4222><s%> <S%G3165><s%> I was <S%G2252><s%> a stranger, <S%G3581><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye took me in: <S%G4863><s%> <S%G3165><s%>

Naked, <S%G1131><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye clothed <S%G4016><s%> me: <S%G3165><s%> I was sick, <S%G770><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye visited <S%G1980><s%> me: <S%G3165><s%> I was <S%G2252><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> prison, <S%G5438><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye came <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> shall the <S%G3588><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%> answer <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> when <S%G4219><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> we thee <S%G4571><s%> hungry, <S%G3983><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fed <S%G5142><s%> thee? or <S%G2228><s%> thirsty, <S%G1372><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gave thee drink? <S%G4222><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> When <S%G4219><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> we thee <S%G4571><s%> a stranger, <S%G3581><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> took thee in? <S%G4863><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> naked, <S%G1131><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> clothed <S%G4016><s%> thee?

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> shall answer <S%G611><s%> and say <S%G2046><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> Inasmuch as <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3745><s%> ye have done <S%G4160><s%> it unto one <S%G1520><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> least <S%G1646><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> ye have done <S%G4160><s%> it unto me. <S%G1698><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> shall he say <S%G2046><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> unto them <S%G3588><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> the left hand, <S%G2176><s%> Depart <S%G4198><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me, <S%G1700><s%> ye cursed, <S%G2672><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> fire, <S%G4442><s%> prepared <S%G2090><s%> for the <S%G3588><s%> devil <S%G1228><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> angels: <S%G32><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I was hungry, <S%G3983><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye gave <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> meat: <S%G5315><s%> I was thirsty, <S%G1372><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye gave me no drink: <S%G4222><s%> <S%G3165><s%>

I was <S%G2252><s%> a stranger, <S%G3581><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye took me not in: <S%G4863><s%> <S%G3165><s%> <S%G3756><s%> naked, <S%G1131><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye clothed <S%G4016><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> not: <S%G3756><s%> sick, <S%G772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> prison, <S%G5438><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye visited <S%G1980><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> not. <S%G3756><s%>
